img_above_text:
Stick to staying in safe spots to keep using Thrust Stance out of the range of his roots, or Pillar Stance above him, and look for his many openings when he tumbles to the ground to press the attack, and he'll fall before long, granting you both the **Old Ginseng Guai Spirit** , Millenium Ginseng Seeds to give to Chen Loong, and the **Ginseng Cape** to wear.
Old Ginseng Guai
img_below_text:
With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!
![Wukong Karma 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Wukong_Karma_21.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 92 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "Stick to staying in safe spots to keep using Thrust Stance out of the range of his roots, or Pillar Stance above him, and look for his many openings when he tumbles to the ground to press the attack, and he'll fall before long, granting you both the **Old Ginseng Guai Spirit** , Millenium Ginseng Seeds to give to Chen Loong, and the **Ginseng Cape** to wear.
Old Ginseng Guai"
            - Following Text: "With the Yaoguai Chief defeated, be sure to check around behind the large stone monument near where you fought the miniboss. On a small snow-covered table, you can find the **Jade Essence** \- a new Gourd Drink that allows you to recover mana as well as health!
![Wukong Karma 21.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/7f/Wukong_Karma_21.jpg)"

            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where the player character stands near a large stone monument in a snowy environment. The focus is on a small snow-covered table behind the monument, where a new item called the **Jade Essence** can be picked up. This item is a Gourd Drink that allows the player to recover both mana and health. The image serves to guide players to this hidden item location after defeating the Yaoguai Chief miniboss.
